text: Frank Charles Barnaby (27 September 1927 - 1 August 2020) was an English nuclear physicist. He worked at the Nuclear Issues Consultant to the Oxford Research Group.Oxford Research Group: Staff and consultants Barnaby was Director of the Stockholm International Peace Research Institute (SIPRI) from 1971 to 1981. In 1981, Barnaby became a founding member of the World Cultural Council. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:English physicists
title: Frank Barnaby
